title_TOSRequestText: By creating a <emphasis>Peerio</> account, you agree to our<tosLink>terms of use.</>
title_passwordIntro: This password is for <emphasis>this device only</>.
title_MPIntro1: Your <emphasis>Master Password is required</> to log in to a new device.
title_MPIntro2: It is available in the <emphasis>Security Settings</> of the app.
title_passwordHint_case: Use both upper and lower case
title_passwordHint_specialChars: Use at least one special character
serverWarning_emailConfirmationSent: Please check your email to confirm your address.
serverWarning_emailConfirmationSent_mobi: Please check your email to confirm your address.
error_usernameBadFormat: Only letters, numbers or underscore allowed.
error_passwordSuggestionGeneric: Mixing case, numbers, and symbols, helps make a stronger password.
error_signupServerError: Server error. Please try again later.
title_mailNull2: Private encrypted mail for <emphasis>All</> of your contacts.
title_passphraseExplanation: Give this passphrase to the recipient.
title_emptyMailDetail: Your message doesn't have a subject or body, are you sure you want to send it?
dialog_mailRevokeText: Revoking this message means the recipient(s) will no longer be able to access it.
dialog_mailDeleteText: This message has not been revoked. The recipient(s) can continue to access the message until it expires.
error_mailQuotaExceeded: You're out of Mail to email addresses. Upgrade to send more.
title_chatBeginning: This is the beginning of your chat history with
title_fileWillBeShared: File(s) will be shared with the current chat
dialog_androidEncryptionStatusOff: Your device supports full disk encryption, but it is not currently enabled. Peerio highly recommends the use of disk encryption. Would you like to learn more?
dialog_androidEncryptionStatusPartial: Your device has encryption turned on but your PIN is still set to the default. We recommend setting a unique PIN. Would you like to learn more?
dialog_confirmDeleteFile: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
dialog_confirmDeleteFiles: Are you sure you want to delete {count} files?
dialog_toExternal: Downloads will be saved to a shared directory to give access to other apps.
error_fileSizeChanged: File size has changed, not resuming upload.
error_contactFingerprintChangedDetail: This contact's Peerio ID# has changed. Verify the new ID# with your contact by calling them or using another messaging service to be sure of their identity. <contactFingerprintUrl> Find out more. </>
title_QRcodeDetail: Quickly log in on another device by scanning a code.
title_2FADetail: Peerio can pair with an app on your mobile device to provide additional account security. <tfaDetailUrl>Find out more</>.
title_2FASetupDesktopDetail: Use your favorite authenticator app to scan the QR code below. Peerio recommends Authy or FreeOTP.
title_2FASetupDesktopDetail2: After scanning the QR code, enter the six-digit code generated by your mobile device to confirm setup.
title_backupCodesDetail: If you lose access to your device you can use these backup codes. Keep them safe by writing them down or printing them.
title_enterPasswordDetail: Your device password is required to continue.
title_MPDetail: Keep your Master Password safe by writing it down or storing it in a password manager. You will need it to set up Peerio on a new device. <mpDetailUrl>Find out more</>.
title_MPDetail2: Peerio encrypts your information with a Master Password that is randomly generated on your device when you sign up. Don't share your Master Password with anyone.
title_accountActivityDetail: View your login history including dates, times, and IP addresses used to access your Peerio account.
title_privacyDetail: Other users can find you using
title_helpText: Get help and give us feedback.
dialog_updateAvailable: Version {releaseName} has been downloaded and is ready to install.
error_HHmailLoadFail: Secure Mail could not be opened. Please check your passphrase.
title_HHcontactUs: Contact us on Peerio at username <emphasis>Peerio</>
title_HHmailExpiresAt: This Secure Mail will disappear on: {expirationDate}.
title_HHyouHaveMail: You have a Peerio Secure Mail from -
title_HHdownloadPeerioContent: <url>Download our mobile and desktop apps</> for more features like encrypted chat, emails, file sharing, and cloud storage.
